SEARCH
Package gameServer

Class GameServer.GameThread

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
gameServer.GameServer.GameThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Enclosing class:
GameServer
private class GameServer.GameThread extends Thread
Each GameThread supports Socket interaction with a single Player.

It maintains the state of the player and handles all the commands from the player.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

  • Constructor Details

    • GameThread

      GameThread(Socket playerSocket)
      Constructor to create a GameThread
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Starts the thread and handles all the commands from the player. It also handles the player disconnection.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class Thread

    • isSocketConnected

      private static boolean isSocketConnected(Socket socket)
      Checks if the socket is still connected.
      Parameters:
      socket - socket object to send the heartbeat over the connection with the player
      Returns:
      true if socket is connected else false

    • handlePlayerDisconnect

      private void handlePlayerDisconnect() throws IOException
      Handles the player disconnection. It removes the player from all the active games and assigns a new leader if the player was a leader.
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • handle

      private void handle(String inputCommand) throws IOException
      Validates the input command and delegates to the command handler.
      Parameters:
      inputCommand - command from the player
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • invokeCommandHandler

      private void invokeCommandHandler(String inputCommand) throws IOException
      Invokes the command handler based on the input command.
      Parameters:
      inputCommand - command from the player
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • executeGoodbye

      private void executeGoodbye(String[] fullCommand) throws IOException
      Executes the command GOODBYE. It removes the player from all the active games and closes the connection with the player.
      Parameters:
      fullCommand - command from the player
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • executeRestart

      private void executeRestart(String[] fullCommand) throws IOException
      Executes the command RESTART. It restarts the game if the player is a leader, else it responds with an error.
      Parameters:
      fullCommand - command from the player
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • executeWordCount

      private void executeWordCount(String[] fullCommand) throws IOException
      Executes the command WORD_COUNT. It adds the player's guess to the game if the player is not a word picker, and calculates the winner if all the players have guessed.
      Parameters:
      fullCommand - command from the player
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • executeRandomWord

      private void executeRandomWord(String[] fullCommand) throws IOException
      Executes the command RANDOM_WORD. It adds the player's guess to the game if the player is a word picker
      Parameters:
      fullCommand - command from the player
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • executeFileUpload

      private void executeFileUpload(String[] fullCommand) throws IOException
      Executes the command FILE_UPLOAD. It uploads the file to the game if the player is a leader and the file is not already used in the same game session.
      Parameters:
      fullCommand - command from the player
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • executeStartGame

      private void executeStartGame(String[] fullCommand) throws IOException
      Executes the command START_GAME. It starts the game if the player is a leader and the game has minimum required players, else it responds with an error.
      Parameters:
      fullCommand - command from the player
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • executeJoinGame

      private void executeJoinGame(String[] fullCommand) throws IOException
      Executes the command JOIN_GAME. It adds the player to the game if the game is not full or already running, else it responds with an error.
      Parameters:
      fullCommand - command from the player
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • executeCloseGame

      private void executeCloseGame(String[] fullCommand) throws IOException
      Executes the command CLOSE. It closes the game if the player is a leader, else it responds with an error. It also removes the player from the game and game from the active games.
      Parameters:
      fullCommand - command from the player
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • executeNewGame

      private void executeNewGame(String[] fullCommand) throws IOException
      Executes the command NEW_GAME. It creates a new game if the game doesn't already exist, else it responds with an error.
      Parameters:
      fullCommand - command from the player
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • executeHello

      private void executeHello(String[] fullCommand) throws IOException
      Executes the command HELLO. It registers the player if it's a new player, else it resumes the player's state. It also checks if the player is already in any active games and adds the player back to the game.
      Parameters:
      fullCommand - command from the player
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • isNewPlayer

      private boolean isNewPlayer()
      Player is registered after it's first command as HELLO. This method helps to identify if the player is new.
      Returns:
      true if the player is new else false i.e. player is already registered

    • respond

      private void respond(String message) throws IOException
      Responds to the player with the message.
      Parameters:
      message - message to be sent to the player.
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player.

    • isValid

      private boolean isValid(String input) throws IOException
      Validates the input command to not empty or blank.
      Parameters:
      input - command from the player
      Returns:
      true if the command is valid else false
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if there is an error in sending the response to the player

    • getPlayer

      public GameServer.Player getPlayer()
      Returns the player object.
      Returns:
      player object
